description:
Oda’s army is on the move in the south, while his most lethal assassins strike the opposition leaders of the east. As Takeda and Uesugi fight for their lives, many loyal to the alliance meet their demise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kai no Tora, Midaigawa ni Shisu!
The Tiger of Kai Dies at Midaigawa!
甲斐の虎, 御勅使川に死す!
